attributes.action: BAN PRISONERS ACCESS TO SOCIAL NETWORK SITES
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: victim families of crime demand that prisoners should not be allowed to set up facebook groups and accounts on sites such as twitter as the system is being abused and used to exploit them. On-line ASBO solution required URGENTLY.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to ban prisoners access to social network sites.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 


http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=E-ASBO


Her Majesty's Government
